org.game_battle.view

Class WorldMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.game_battle.view.WorldMapView

  • public class WorldMapView
extends java.lang.Object
    WorldMapView class to display the Continents,its control values countries and their respective neighbours,connectivity of the countries and map edit option.
    Version:
    Alpha
    Author:
    basant
